thread.title: Adele's Gorgeous Green Givenchy Gown Will Make You Sit Up and Say "Hello!"
thread.title_full: Adele's Gorgeous Green Givenchy Gown Will Make You Sit Up and Say "Hello!"

author: Hannah Weil McKinley
title: Adele's Gorgeous Green Givenchy Gown Will Make You Sit Up and Say "Hello!"
text:
Adele's Givenchy Dress at 2017 Grammys Adele's Gorgeous Green Givenchy Gown Will Make You Sit Up and Say "Hello!" February 12, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Adele's Gorgeous Green Givenchy Gown Will Make You Sit Up and Say "Hello!" 
What does a megastar wear to the Grammys ? Well, you likely don't need red carpet stunts, just a really fabulous dress — enter Adele in Givenchy Couture by Riccardo Tisci. The custom creation, finished in military green silk satin and lace and embroidered all over with Swarovski crystals, was likely one of Tisci's last designs for the house, since news broke that he is leaving Givenchy . For Grammy-nominated Adele, it's an elegant, statement-making gown perfect for collecting her awards; for Riccardo, it's going out with a bang. 
Read on to see the dress in detail, because it deserves your full attention.
